answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hello Jennifer,
I'm afraid there's no place on the website to solicit proposals. Although our job board is very popular for connecting local governments to talented professionals, it doesn't currently support RFPs.
However, we do have a good collection of sample RFPs in the Knowledge Network's document section, in case that's helpful in your process.


Hello Jennifer,

I'm afraid there's no place on the website to solicit proposals. Although our job board is very popular for connecting local governments to talented professionals, it doesn't currently support RFPs.

author: Jennifer Grimmell
text:
Hello - I work for the Loudoun County Planning Department (Virginia) and would like to post a Request for Proposal for Consulting services for a Zoning Ordinance Amendment (Route 28 Implementation Project).  Can you tell me if it is possible to post such a proposal to your website and if so, what if any fee is associated with the process?
Thank you,
Jennifer Grimmell
jennifer.grimmell@loudoun.gov
title: Request for Proposal
